summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3953 for the improvement of 49th Avenue Southwest, from West Dawson Street to West Edmunds Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48222, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
